information:
The Prince is the only son and successor 
of the late King Krichevskoy, dood! 
And an autocratic egotist, dood!

His Evility can boost the stats of all party members, which is very useful, dood! 
And it's easy to boost the damage of his Skills, dood!

He's a straight-hearted young man 
who's not good at telling lies and dealing with girls, dood. 
He seems to be in love with Rozalin, dood.

He has very high HP and attack, dood!
His Evility boosting fist-equipping characters is also excellent, dood!
He's the current Dean of Evil Academy, dood. With an Evil Quotient of 1.8 Million, he conducts shady experiments all day long, dood.

His Evility that weakens enemy defense 
is powerful and easy to use as it does not get affected by party setup, dood!
He's a Prinny Instructor in the Nether Prison, Hades. His true identity is a vampire who loves sardines... No, I mean the vampire, known as the "Tyrant", dood!
He's got a vicious Evility that greatly increases the physical attack of sword-equipping characters, dood. His Skill can heal while dealing damage, dood!

He became a lone avenger after his loved one was taken from him, dood. 
But now, he's a fighter with excellent cooking skills, dood!
He's got top-class attack, and a strong Evility that greatly boosts the physical attack of fist-equipping characters, dood!
A sheltered princess who was raised as the only daughter of the Overlord, dood! She seems to be in a lovey-dovey relationship with Adell, they're nauseating, dood.
She's a charming lady with high speed and magical attack, along with an Evility that boosts the physical attack of male characters, dood!
She's been branded a Delinquent since the foundation of Evil Academy, dood. Her delinquency is legendary.
Her Evility that raises the defense of the party is easy to use regardless of the situation, dood! And she's got top-class magical attack, dood!

She's the ultimate weapon created to destroy the world, dood. 
She's been practicing hard to become the strongest Final Boss, dood!

She's an excellent attacker with AOE skills available from the start and an Evility 
that boosts the abilities of monster units, dood!
As the Gorgeous Overlord, she's the most wealthy being in the Three Worlds, dood. It's said that all men are infatuated with her, dood.

Her Evility can make herself stronger 
if there are more male characters in the party, dood! And she's got top-class speed, dood!
She's an angel from Celestia who wants to become an Overlord, dood. She loves her brother, Prince Laharl, and us Prinnies. A REAL angel, dood!
She can use AOE attacks and healing skills, her Evility can boost the magical attack of party members. And she loves Prinnies! She's PERFECT, dood!
